description: Pope Francis reads a virtual Easter message instead of addressing crowds amid the virus lockdown.
title: Coronavirus: Pope calls for global solidarity in Easter message
title_page: Coronavirus: Pope calls for global solidarity in Easter message - BBC News
maintext: The Pope, who usually delivers the message to tens of thousands of people gathered at the square outside the basilica, expressed particular concern for the future of Europe. He warned that the European Union risked collapse if it did not agree on how to help the region recover.
